requests.name: search/vin/{vin}
requests.description: Returns payments for Floorplan specified by vin.

requests.name: getaccountfees
requests.description: Gets all account fees for logged in dealer.
requests.data:
SelectedFloorplans: List
{
FloorplanId: String
BuyerBusinessId: String
Vin: String
StockNumber: String
DaysOnFloorplan: String
UnitDescription: String
UnitColor: String
UnitStatusId: String
CreditType: String
CurrentPayoff: Decimal
AmountDue: Decimal
PrincipalPayoff: Decimal
PrincipalDue: Decimal
DueDate: Int
ScheduleSetupDate: Int
Scheduled: Boolean
HasNsf: Boolean
IsPayoff: Boolean
PayAmountDue: Boolean
PayPayoffAmount: Boolean
}
AccountFees: List
{
FinancialRecordId : String
FinancialRecordTypeId: int (Payable=1, PaymentSent=2, Fee=4, Interest=5 OneDayLoan=6, Payment=7, Principal=8, RecordVoid=9, UnappliedFundsDepost=10, UnappliedFundsWithdrawl=11, RecordReapplied=12, Insurance=13, UnappliedFundsTransfer=14, AddOnCombined=15, AddOnLineItem=16, ReserveFundsDeposit=17, ReserveFundsWithdrawl=18, ReserveFundsTransfer=19)
Balance: Decimal
EffectiveUnixDate: Int
Description: String
IsFee: Boolean
FloorplanId: String
StockNumber: String
Vin: String
ApplyToFinancialRecordId: String
}
BankAccountId: String
}
